# My analysis

```{r iris2}
library(rstuff)
iris2 = iris.scale.width(2)
plot(iris2$Petal.Length, iris2$Petal.Width, main="Edgar Anderson's Iris Data (double width)")
```

```{r iris5, echo=FALSE}

```
